Title: Frequently asked questions

FAQs.Question: How often should I have my patio/deck/siding pressure washed?
FAQs.Answer: We recommend pressure washing at least once a year, depending on the local climate and the material of your patio, deck, or siding.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to be home during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: No, our professional team can efficiently handle the job even in your absence.

FAQs.Question: How long does it take to pressure wash an average-sized home?
FAQs.Answer: Most pressure washing jobs can be completed within a few hours, depending on the size and condition of the property.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to remove all outdoor items, such as furniture, before the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, to protect your outdoor items from the pressure washing process, we recommend removing or covering them.

FAQs.Question: Can pressure washing damage my property's surface?
FAQs.Answer: Our team is trained to adjust the pressure and technique based on the material being cleaned, making pressure washing safe for most surfaces.

FAQs.Question: What cleaning agents do you use during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: We use a range of environmentally friendly cleaning agents that are safe for pets and plants, and suitable for different surfaces.

FAQs.Question: Are you licensed and insured to provide pressure washing services?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we are fully licensed, insured, and certified by the Better Business Bureau to provide pressure washing services.

FAQs.Question: Do you provide any guarantees for your work?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we guarantee your satisfaction at a reasonable and comfortable cost.
